title: LF mid laner D5+
body:
Hey guys, just a quick post. Bandit E-sports is currently looking for a Diamond 5+ mid laner to join our roster. We want to expand our image as an org and your individual presence within the community. Either add me or message our twitter for details.

Thank guys!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BanditESC
Twitter for LOL: https://twitter.com/BanditLOL1
IGN: Javey Dones
